sense.def:
Kadar sta dve ali več stvari
alike
, so videti enake.

seg.quote: They all look alike to me.

sense.def:
Alike
pomeni tudi na podoben način.

seg.quote: The children are all treated alike.

sense.def:
Besedo
alike
uporabimo potem, ko omenimo določeno skupino ljudi, če želimo poudariti, da mislimo na skupino v celoti.

seg.quote: The strike is damaging to managers and workers alike.
